name: Starfox AR
description:
Play as Andross and Defeat Starfox using the TrueDepth Sensor on your iPhone X.

Objective:

  • Defeat Starfox!

Controls:

  • Open your mouth to fire at Starfox
  • Turn your head to aim your shots
  • Close your eyes to become invisible!

Compatibility:

  • Requires iPhone X running iOS 11.0 or newer

Developed by: Rigel Benton

Graphic Design: Kaci Lambeth

3D Art: Jeff Arthur

Created at the VR Austin Jam 2017!
